column2: You can erect a stele and immortalise the your or your close ones' life. The cravings can even teach the future generations something.
Dozens of different artisans and materials are available for the making of the stele, but you need to choose how much money to spend on it.
The stele will be low or medium quality and it will be done rather soon.
The stele will be low, medium or high quality and it will be done in a moderate amount of time.
The stele will be medium or high quality and its construction can take a lot of time.
The workers are ready and the materials are on the way. The only question is who you want the stele to be about.
It should be me, of course.
My grandfather, [stele_grand_father.GetFirstName] will be a fitting example.
Let it be about my sibling, [stele_sibling.GetFirstName].
My dear friend, [stele_friend.GetFirstName] should be the one.
All I can think of is my lover, [stele_lover.GetFirstName].
I will pull a pun on my rival, [stele_rival.GetFirstName.]
You no longer believe in the divinity of the steles and the construction is cancelled.
I only regret paying for this...
An artisan reports you that your stele is finally finished. It stands tall and it will do it for centuries!
The leader of artisans working on your stele asked you today if you want only the best to work on it or you would let the apprentices working on it too.
That's supposed to be a masterpiece.
Is there a way somewhere in the middle?
I don't want to wait for it too much.
Quality will increase, but it will be done later.
Quality will decrease, but it will be done sooner.
Some [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s visited you today and they are insisting on putting a couple of religious symbols on your stele.
The stele will be done a bit later.
Quality will increase, but it will be done a lot later.
You visited the workshop where your stele is being made and one of the artisans really caught your eye...
My feelings are above this construction.
This stele describes the life and acts of [Root.stele_target.GetBestName]
The personality and habits of this mage are very inappropriate for [GetHerHis] position. And what's worse, [GetSheHe] has been unable to hide them from public view.
column3: La personnalité et les moeurs de ce godi sont très inappropriées pour quelqu'un de sa fonction. Pire encore, [GetIlElle] est incapable de commettre ses actes impies discrètement.
column4: Die Persönlichkeit und Gewohnheiten des Priesters sind äußerst unpassend für [GetHerHis]en Stand. Auch vermag [GetSheHe] es keineswegs, seine schlechten Eigenschaften vor der Allgemeinheit zu verbergen.
column6: La personalidad y hábitos de este sacerdote son muy inapropiados para esta posición. Y lo peor es que no es capaz de esconderlos en público.

column2: There are things a [Root.GetTitle] should not do and should not be. But we are only human after all, and as long as people aren't aware of your vices and faults it's not a problem. However, it seems you've been slipping in discretion lately - gossip is starting to spread, and there are murmurings all over the Muslim world about your wicked habits.
column3: Un calife ne peut pas se permettre certaines choses, ne peut pas être certaines choses. Mais nous ne sommes que des humains après tout, et tant que personne ne sera au courant de nos vices, il n'y aura pas de problème. Cependant, il semble que vous ayez manqué de discrétion ces derniers temps et des rumeurs commencent à se répandre. On murmure dans tout le monde musulman au sujet de vos habitudes malsaines.
column4: Es gibt Dinge, die ein Kalif weder sein noch tun sollte. Trotzdem sind wir alle Menschen und solange niemand über Eure Laster und Fehler bescheid weiß, ist dies auch unproblematisch. Allerdings habt Ihr in letzter Zeit die nötige Diskretion vermissen lassen. Gerüchte sind aufgekommen und in weiten Teilen der muslimischen Welt spricht man im Geheimen über Eure lasterhaften Taten.
column6: Hay cosas que un Califa no debería hacer y no debería ser. Pero, después de todo, sólo somos humanos y mientras la gente no conozca vuestros vicios y fallos, no es un problema. No obstante, parece que últimamente no habéis sido muy discreto. Los chismorreos se extienden y hay rumores en todo el mundo musulmán acerca de vuestros hábitos infames.

column2: Widespread rumors say that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has a most worrying personality and lifestyle, quite unsuitable for any priest and even more so for one in his exalted position.
column3: Selon des rumeurs persistantes, [From.Get_le_TitledFirstName] mène une vie des plus dissolues et possède une personnalité très inquiétante. C'est déjà inconvenant pour un godi, et donc encore plus grave pour quelqu'un de haut rang.
column4: Gerüchten zufolge geben Charakter und Lebenswandel von [From.GetTitledFirstName] Anlass zu ernsten Bedenken. Dies ist völlig untragbar für einen Priester in solch einer Position.
column6: Se han extendido rumores que dicen que [From.GetTitledFirstName] tiene una personalidad y lleva un estilo de vida preocupantes, bastante inapropiados para un sacerdote y más para uno de su posición.

column2: The Gods will not be pleased.
column6: A los Dioses no les gustará.
